creator: Novi Digital
descriptionHtml:
Install the latest version of the Hotstar app, which we have released as a new app (with a new app_ID), on your Android device!

Hotstar is your go-to video streaming app for the best of Indian entertainment, TV shows, LIVE cricket, news and movies. Enjoy unlimited access to your favorite Star India TV shows, 200 days of LIVE cricket, exclusive Hotstar Specials from India’s best filmmakers and storytellers, blockbuster movies, and LIVE news in 7 Indian languages.

What you’ll love on Hotstar:

A. LIVE Cricket: Enjoy the best of cricket LIVE on Hotstar anytime, anywhere with a host of features including an exclusive Dugout commentary feed, pre-match and post-match analysis, regional and expert commentary in six languages, original cricket shows and behind the scenes action.

Stream these tournaments LIVE on Hotstar:

• India vs South Africa
• India vs Bangladesh
• India vs West Indies
• Ranji Trophy
• India vs Australia
• VIVO IPL 2020
• And much more

B. Best of Indian Entertainment: Can’t get enough of your daily dose of Indian entertainment? We’ve got you covered! Watch your favorite serials and shows including Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, Kasautii Zindagi Kay, Yeh HaiMohabbatein, Super Singer, Karthika Deepam, and more even before India watches them. Shows are available on-demand from these Star India channels:

• Star Plus
• Star Bharat
• Star Maa
• Star Jalsha
• Star Pravah
• Star Utsav
• Star Vijay
• Star Suvarna
• Asianet

C. Blockbuster Movies: Our curated movie library includes the latest hits, evergreen favorites, documentaries and critically-acclaimed films across languages.

• Super 30
• De De Pyaar De
• India’s Most Wanted
• Badhaai Ho
• Saamy 2
• Baahubali 2
• Neerja
• Mangalyaan: India’s Mission to Mars
• And much more

D. Hotstar Specials: Our EXCLUSIVE slate of BIG, bold and authentic stories from India’s most acclaimed storytellers including Shekhar Kapur, Kabir Khan, Nikkhil Advani, Ram Madhvani, Venkat Prabhu, Sudhir Mishra, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Nagesh Kukunoor, and more. Our current titles include:

• Roar of the Lion
• City of Dreams
• Hostages
• Criminal Justice
• The Office (S1 & S2)

E. LIVE News: Stay up to date with LIVE news from leading Indian channels

• Republic TV
• NDTV 24x7
• NDTV India
• Polimer News
• Asianet News
• TV9 Telugu
• TV9 Gujrati

Hotstar is your go-to video streaming app for the best of Indian entertainment, TV shows, LIVE cricket, news and movies. Enjoy unlimited access to your favorite Star India TV shows, 200 days of LIVE cricket, exclusive Hotstar Specials from India’s best filmmakers and storytellers, blockbuster movies, and LIVE news in 7 Indian languages.

What you’ll love on Hotstar:

A. LIVE Cricket: Enjoy the best of cricket LIVE on Hotstar anytime, anywhere with a host of features including an exclusive Dugout commentary feed, pre-match and post-match analysis, regional and expert commentary in six languages, original cricket shows and behind the scenes action.

Stream these tournaments LIVE on Hotstar:

• India vs South Africa
• India vs Bangladesh
• India vs West Indies
• Ranji Trophy
• India vs Australia
• VIVO IPL 2020
• And much more

B. Best of Indian Entertainment: Can’t get enough of your daily dose of Indian entertainment? We’ve got you covered! Watch your favorite serials and shows including Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, Kasautii Zindagi Kay, Yeh HaiMohabbatein, Super Singer, Karthika Deepam, and more even before India watches them. Shows are available on-demand from these Star India channels:

• Star Plus
• Star Bharat
• Star Maa
• Star Jalsha
• Star Pravah
• Star Utsav
• Star Vijay
• Star Suvarna
• Asianet

C. Blockbuster Movies: Our curated movie library includes the latest hits, evergreen favorites, documentaries and critically-acclaimed films across languages.

• Super 30
• De De Pyaar De
• India’s Most Wanted
• Badhaai Ho
• Saamy 2
• Baahubali 2
• Neerja
• Mangalyaan: India’s Mission to Mars
• And much more

D. Hotstar Specials: Our EXCLUSIVE slate of BIG, bold and authentic stories from India’s most acclaimed storytellers including Shekhar Kapur, Kabir Khan, Nikkhil Advani, Ram Madhvani, Venkat Prabhu, Sudhir Mishra, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Nagesh Kukunoor, and more. Our current titles include:

• Roar of the Lion
• City of Dreams
• Hostages
• Criminal Justice
• The Office (S1 & S2)

E. LIVE News: Stay up to date with LIVE news from leading Indian channels

• Republic TV
• NDTV 24x7
• NDTV India
• Polimer News
• Asianet News
• TV9 Telugu
• TV9 Gujrati

Privacy policy: https://www.hotstar.com/us/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://www.hotstar.com/us/terms-of-use
descriptionShort: Watch the latest and best of Live Sports, TV and Movies in multiple languages.

creator: Novi Digital
descriptionHtml:
Hotstar is your go-to video streaming app for the best of Indian entertainment, TV shows, LIVE cricket, movies and news. Enjoy unlimited access to your favorite Star India TV shows, non-stop LIVE cricket, blockbuster movies, exclusive Hotstar Specials from India’s best filmmakers and storytellers, and LIVE news in multiple Indian languages.

What you’ll love on Hotstar:

A. Dream11 IPL: Enjoy the Dream11 IPL 2020 streaming LIVE on Hotstar. You can catch all the Dream11 IPL action anytime, anywhere and on any device. Hotstar offers a host of exciting features to make the cricket fans' experience truly memorable. These features include:

Regional and expert commentary in multiple Indian languages
Exclusive Dugout commentary feed
Pre-match and post-match analysis
Users comments and emojis
Meme creation
Duets with Cricketers
Original cricket shows and behind the scenes action

B. Blockbuster Movies: Our curated movie library includes the latest hits, exclusive movie premieres, evergreen favorites, documentaries and critically-acclaimed films across languages.
Dil Bechara
Lootcase
Sadak 2
Khuda Haafiz

Tanhaji
Panga
Chhapaak
Bala
Chhichhore
Mission Mangal
Prati Roju Pandage
Comali
Baahubali 2
And much more

C. Best of Indian Entertainment: Can’t get enough of your daily dose of Indian entertainment? We’ve got you covered! Watch your favorite serials and shows including Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, Kasautii Zindagi Kay, Shaadi Mubarak, Anupamaa, Super Singer, Karthika Deepam, and more even before India watches them. Shows are available on-demand from these Star India channels:
Star Plus
Star Bharat
Star Maa
Star Jalsha
Star Pravah
Star Utsav
Star Vijay
Star Suvarna
Asianet

D. Hotstar Specials: Our EXCLUSIVE slate of BIG, bold and authentic stories from India’s most acclaimed storytellers including Shekhar Kapur, Kabir Khan, Nikkhil Advani, Ram Madhvani, Venkat Prabhu, Sudhir Mishra, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Nagesh Kukunoor, and more. Our current titles include:
Aarya
Special Ops
Hostages (S1 & S2)
Hundred
Out of Love
Criminal Justice

Roar of the Lion
City of Dreams
